short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill form once. Auto fill it forever.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoFiller - Save Time, Boost Efficiency

AutoFiller is your go-to Chrome extension for streamlining repetitive form-filling tasks. Simply fill out a form once, save the input set, and let AutoFiller handle the rest. Whenever you revisit a website with a matching URL, AutoFiller will automatically populate the form fields with your saved data.

This tool is especially useful for developers and QA testers who need to repeatedly input data while testing websites or applications. Whether it's login pages, sign-up forms, or checkout details, AutoFiller ensures you never waste time re-entering the same information. Perfect for enhancing productivity and minimizing manual input.
